import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Textform(props){const[text,setText]=useState('Enter Text Here');const[bk,setBk]=useState({color:'dark',backgroundColor:'white'});const handleConvertToUpperCase=()=>{setText(prevText=>prevText.toUpperCase());};const handleConvertTolowerCase=()=>{setText(haha=>haha.toLowerCase());};const removeSpaces=()=>{setText(prevText=>prevText.replace(/\s/g,''));};const cleartext=()=>{setText("");};const Copytext=()=>{navigator.clipboard.writeText(text).then(()=>{alert('Text copied to clipboard:',text);}).catch(error=>{console.error('Error copying text to clipboard:',error);});};const Downloadtext=()=>{// Create a Blob with the text content

const url=URL.createObjectURL(blob);// Create a link element
const link=document.createElement('a');// Set the link's attributes
link.href=url;link.download='Text.txt';// Append the link to the document
document.body.appendChild(link);// Trigger a click on the link to start the download
link.click();// Remove the link from the document
document.body.removeChild(link);// Revoke the temporary URL

});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{style:{marginTop:'50px'},className:"container mt-5 text-".concat(props.mode==='light'?'dark':'light'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"pb-2",htmlFor:"mybox",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Enter Text Below"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-check form-switch",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{onClick:darkmode,className:"form-check-input mt-2",type:"checkbox",id:"radio"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Enable dark mode"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{style:bk,className:"form-control",id:"mybox",rows:"10",value:text,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"btn m-2 btn-primary",onClick:handleConvertToUpperCase,children:" Convert To Upper Case "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"btn m-2 btn-primary",onClick:handleConvertTolowerCase,children:" Convert To lower Case "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"btn m-2 btn-primary",onClick:removeSpaces,children:" Remove Spaces "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"btn m-2 btn-primary",onClick:cleartext,children:" Cleartext"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"btn m-2 btn-primary",onClick:Downloadtext,children:" Downloadtext"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"btn m-2 btn-primary",onClick:Copytext,children:" Copytext"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:["Number of character: ",text.length," Number of Words: ",text.length>0?text.split(" ").length:0]})]})})});}
